location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the Governor of Bombay approves of his decision to detain a vessel from Ruselkhima [Ra's al-Khaymah], and that the British expedition to suppress piracy in the Persian Gulf is expected to set sail in a few days.
